statements: SELECT * FROM error_correction_operations
SELECT qubit_state, error_syndrome FROM error_correction_operations ORDER BY qubit_state ASC
SELECT qubit_state, correction_operation FROM error_correction_operations WHERE error_syndrome='XYZ'
SELECT DISTINCT error_syndrome FROM error_correction_operations ORDER BY error_syndrome DESC
SELECT AVG(LENGTH(error_syndrome)) AS avg_error_syndrome_length FROM error_correction_operations
SELECT qubit_state, error_syndrome, correction_operation FROM error_correction_operations WHERE qubit_state='|0⟩'
SELECT error_syndrome, correction_operation, qubit_state FROM error_correction_operations WHERE error_syndrome='X'
SELECT * FROM error_correction_operations WHERE correction_operation IS NOT NULL ORDER BY qubit_state DESC
SELECT qubit_state, correction_operation FROM error_correction_operations WHERE error_syndrome='Y' ORDER BY qubit_state ASC
SELECT DISTINCT error_syndrome, correction_operation FROM error_correction_operations
SELECT * FROM error_syndromes;
SELECT syndrome_description FROM error_syndromes WHERE syndrome_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM error_corrections WHERE correction_id = 3;
SELECT syndrome_description, correction_operation FROM error_syndromes JOIN error_corrections ON error_syndromes.syndrome_id = error_corrections.syndrome_id;
SELECT * FROM error_syndromes ORDER BY syndrome_id DESC;
SELECT syndrome_description FROM error_syndromes WHERE syndrome_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM error_syndromes ORDER BY syndrome_id DESC;
SELECT syndrome_description, correction_operation FROM error_syndromes JOIN error_corrections ON error_syndromes.syndrome_id = error_corrections.syndrome_id WHERE error_corrections.correction_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT syndrome_id, syndrome_description FROM error_syndromes WHERE syndrome_description LIKE '%error%';
SELECT syndrome_description FROM error_syndromes WHERE syndrome_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY syndrome_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM qubit_states;
SELECT qubit_state, error_syndrome FROM qubit_states WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, error_correction_op, description FROM error_corrections ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT qubit_id, error_id FROM qubit_errors WHERE qubit_id = 3 AND error_id = 2;
SELECT qubit_state, error_correction_op FROM qubit_states JOIN error_corrections ON qubit_states.id = qubit_errors.qubit_id ORDER BY qubit_state ASC;
SELECT id, qubit_state FROM qubit_states WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM error_corrections WHERE description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id DESC;

SELECT qubit_states.qubit_state, error_corrections.error_correction_op FROM qubit_states JOIN qubit_errors ON qubit_states.id = qubit_errors.qubit_id JOIN error_corrections ON qubit_errors.error_id = error_corrections.id;
SELECT qubit_state FROM qubit_states WHERE qubit_state LIKE '01%';
SELECT qubit_state, error_syndrome FROM qubit_states WHERE error_syndrome = 'XZ';
SELECT * FROM error_syndromes;
SELECT syndrome_id, syndrome_description FROM error_syndromes;
SELECT state_name FROM qubit_states WHERE state_id = 1;
SELECT correction_id, correction_operation FROM error_corrections ORDER BY correction_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM syndrome_corrections WHERE syndrome_id = 3 AND correction_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM error_syndromes;
SELECT syndrome_id, qubit_state FROM error_syndromes WHERE syndrome_id = 1;
SELECT qubit_state, syndrome_description FROM error_syndromes WHERE qubit_state = 'X';
SELECT state_id, state_name FROM qubit_states ORDER BY state_name DESC;
SELECT syndrome_id, COUNT(correction_id) FROM syndrome_corrections GROUP BY syndrome_id HAVING COUNT(correction_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM error_syndromes;
SELECT syndrome_description FROM error_syndromes;
SELECT state_description FROM qubit_states WHERE state_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM syndrome_corrections ORDER BY syndrome_id DESC;
SELECT syndrome_id, correction_id FROM syndrome_corrections WHERE syndrome_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM error_syndromes
SELECT syndrome_id, syndrome_description FROM error_syndromes WHERE syndrome_id = 1
SELECT correction_description FROM error_corrections WHERE correction_id = 3
SELECT state_id, state_description FROM qubit_states ORDER BY state_id DESC
SELECT syndrome_id, correction_id FROM syndrome_corrections JOIN error_corrections ON syndrome_corrections.correction_id = error_corrections.correction_id
